Text:
Unfortunately the patch appears not to work on 64bit. "patch failed".
Note that virus scans will pick up some trojans - but it picks up the same ones from a download direct from the GetFlv site as well!
You may have to switch of scanning whilst installing.
Run patch as Administrator - works on 64-bit
I got the same thing about it being a virus, ignored that but everything else seems to work.
